phase.title: UI Foundation & Asset Manager Implementation
phase.description: Integrate shadcn/ui as the design system foundation and implement the Asset Manager UI using these professional components.

inScope.item: Installation and configuration of shadcn/ui in the Next.js project
Adding core UI components (Button, Card, Input, Dialog, Toast)
Re-implementing the AssetLibrary component using shadcn components
Visual polish of the file upload and deletion workflows

setup.task: Provide terminal commands to initialize shadcn/ui (npx shadcn@latest init)
Provide commands to add required components: button, card, input, dialog, dropdown-menu, toast, skeleton
Ensure lucide-react is installed for icons

implementation.task: Create `components/AssetLibrary.tsx` using shadcn Cards for the grid layout
Use `` for thumbnails and `` for actions (delete)
Implement `` for the delete action with a confirmation dialog
Use `` to provide feedback on success (Upload complete) or error (File too large)
Style the upload area to match the theme (dashed border, centered text, button)
Ensure the layout is responsive (grid-cols-1 to grid-cols-4)

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: shadcn/ui is correctly installed and `components/ui` folder is populated
Asset Manager page looks consistent and professional
User receives visual feedback (Toasts) for all interactions
Delete button is red (destructive variant) and asks for confirmation
